metadata.title: CVE-2022-25258 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in drivers/usb/gadget/composite.c in the Linuxkernel before 5.16.10. The USB Gadget subsystem lacks certain validation ofinterface OS descriptor requests (ones with a large array index and onesassociated with NULL function pointer retrieval). Memory corruption mightoccur.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
